code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Portal from'./StatusDropdownPortal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const JobsList=_ref=>{let{jobsState}=_ref;const[openDropdownId,setOpenDropdownId]=useState(null);const[dropdownCoords,setDropdownCoords]=useState({top:0,left:0});const toggleDropdown=(e,jobId)=>{e.stopPropagation();const rect=e.currentTarget.getBoundingClientRect();if(openDropdownId===jobId){setOpenDropdownId(null);return;}setDropdownCoords({top:rect.bottom,left:rect.left});setOpenDropdownId(jobId);};useEffect(()=>{const handleClickOutside=()=>setOpenDropdownId(null);window.addEventListener('click',handleClickOutside);return()=>window.removeEventListener('click',handleClickOutside);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:jobsState.map(job=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:job.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:job.position}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:e=>toggleDropdown(e,job.id),children:"Actions \u25BC"}),openDropdownId===job.id&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Portal,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'fixed',top:dropdownCoords.top,left:dropdownCoords.left,background:'white',border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'8px',zIndex:9999,boxShadow:'0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)',borderRadius:4},onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#!",onClick:()=>alert('Rejected clicked'),children:"Rejected"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#!",onClick:()=>alert('Interview clicked'),children:"Interview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#!",onClick:()=>alert('Delete clicked'),children:"Delete"})]})})})]})]},job.id))})});};export default JobsList;
